S0281: 你介意我在你开始之前喝完我的咖啡吗？
Do you mind if I finish my coffee before you start?
S0283: 你的哪些朋友说普通话？
Which of your friends speak Mandarin Chinese?
S0284: 你认识我姐姐的朋友吗？
Do you know my sister's friend?
S0286: People who like speaking Mandarin Chinese.
S0287: 你认识多少喜欢看电视的人？
How many people do you know who like watching television?
S0288: 我认识的大多数人喜欢看电视。
Most people I know like watching television.
S0289: 我想知道她今天下午会不会在那里。
I wonder if she's going to be there this afternoon.
S0290: 我想知道他知不知道答案。
I wonder if he knows the answer.
S0291: 我希望我很快能说得更好。
I hope I'll be able to speak better soon.
S0292: 我希望你能来参加聚会。
I hope you'll be able to come to the party.
S0293: 我必须找出他要在哪里和我见面。
I have to find out where he's going to meet me.
S0294: 我今晚没有足够的时间给你打电话。
I don't have enough time to call you tonight.
S0295: 我没有说我想在一天内完成。
I didn't say that I wanted to finish in a day.
S0296: 我说我需要多一点时间。
I said that I needed a little more time.
S0297: 我不认识很多说普通话的人。
I don't know many people who speak Mandarin Chinese.
S0298: I've got nothing left to say.
S0300: She doesn't want to seem unfriendly.
S0301: 他说他想给你看点东西。
He said that he wants to show you something.
S0302: 她说她不想住在城市里。
She said that she doesn't want to live in a city.
S0303: I think that he wants to sit down.
S0304: 我觉得她不想在家工作。
I think that she doesn't want to work from home.
S0306: 我认识那个正在和你朋友说话的年轻女人。
I know that young woman who's talking to your friend.
S0307: 我认识那个坐在那边的年轻男人。
I know that young man who's sitting over there.
S0308: 是的，她是我妈妈的朋友。
Yes she's a friend of my mother.
S0309: No I've never seen her before.
S0310: 她可以写一个关于那个男人的故事。
She could write a story about that man.
S0311: 他不能相信三个最重要的事实。
He couldn't believe the three most important facts.
S0312: 她说她明天晚上可以用另一个房间。
She said that she could use the other room tomorrow night.
S0313: 他说他不能看所有五场比赛。
He said that he couldn't watch all five games.
S0314: 我觉得她可以把它放在桌子上。
I think that she could put it on the table.
S0315: 我觉得他买不起他想要的车。
I think that he couldn't afford the car that he wanted.
S0316: 你觉得她星期一可以带她弟弟来吗？
Do you think that she could bring her brother on Monday?
S0317: 是的，我觉得如果她想的话她可以。
Yes I think she could if she wanted to.
S0318: No I don't think she could this time.
S0319: 她需要搬到另一个国家。
She needs to move to a different country.
S0320: 他今年不需要买另一台电视。
He doesn't need to buy another television this year.
S0322: 她说她需要读同一本书。
She said that she needs to read the same book.
S0323: 他说他不需要走路去学校。
He said that he doesn't need to walk to school.
S0324: 那个学生举起了她的两只手。
That student has both of her hands up.
S0325: 我觉得他需要考虑十个可能的问题。
I think that he needs to consider ten possible problems.
S0326: 我觉得她不需要卖掉公司。
I don't think that she needs to sell the company.
S0327: 你觉得她需要提供另一种方法吗？
Do you think that she needs to offer another way?
S0328: Yes I think she ought to.
S0330: 不，我觉得这不是很重要。
No I don't think it's very important.
S0331: 她不能提供所有的答案。
She can't provide all the answers.
S0332: 他可以为他妹妹建立新生活。
He can build a new life for his sister.
S0333: 她说她不能和小组花很多时间。
She said that she can't spend much time with the group.
S0334: 他说他可以让你抱那只小猫。
He said that he can let you hold the kitten
S0335: 我觉得他可以增加一些有价值的想法。
I think that he can add some valuable ideas.
S0336: I don't think that she can open the door.
S0337: 你觉得他可以继续玩吗？
Do you think that he can continue to play?
S0339: 不，我觉得他伤得很严重。
No I think he's hurt himself quite badly.
S0340: 是的，我确定他会没事的。
Yes I'm sure he's going to be okay.
S0341: I met someone a few days ago.
S0342: 我遇到了一个说了些话的人。
I met someone who said something.
S0343: Who said that she's worried about the economy.
S0344: Who said that he's happy to help you.
S0345: 说他还没准备好离开的人。
Who said that he's not ready to leave yet.
S0346: 我想让她知道我喜欢她的书。
I wanted her to know that I liked her book.
S0347: 他想知道一周前发生了什么。
He wanted to know what was happening a week ago.
S0348: 她不想知道会发生什么。
She didn't want to know what was going to happen.
S0349: 他星期五晚上想出去吗？
Did he want to go out on Friday night?
S0350: 是的，他想见一些老朋友。
Yes he wanted to see some old friends.
